info.name: GanaderaSoft API - Complete
info.description:
API Gateway for GanaderaSoft - Comprehensive Livestock Management System

This collection contains all the API endpoints for managing users, authentication, fincas (farms), reba√±os (herds), animals, inventories, and more.

## Base URL
`{{base_url}}/api`

## Authentication
This API uses Laravel Sanctum for authentication. Most endpoints require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

## Environment Variables
- `base_url`: The base URL of your API (e.g., http://localhost:8000)
- `auth_token`: Bearer token obtained from login/register

## User Types
- `admin`: Full access to all resources
- `propietario`: Can manage their own resources
- `tecnico`: Limited access for technical support

## Main Endpoints
- Propietarios (Property Owners)
- Reba√±os (Herds)
- Animales (Animals)
- Inventarios de B√∫falo (Buffalo Inventories)
- Tipos de Animal (Animal Types)

## Configuration APIs
- Tipo Explotaci√≥n
- M√©todo Riego
- pH Suelo
- Textura Suelo
- Fuente de Agua
- Sexo
- Tipo Relieve
- Composici√≥n Raza
- Etapas

## New Livestock Management APIs
- Personal Finca (Farm Personnel)
- Peso Corporal (Body Weight)
- Lactancia (Lactation Records)
- Leche (Milk Production)
- Medidas Corporales (Body Measurements)
- Cambios Animal (Animal Changes)

## Enhanced Features
- Animal relationship management (estado_animal, etapa_animal)
- Finca terreno data support
- ComposicionRaza API now returns all records without filtering by fk_tipo_animal_id or fk_id_Finca
- Complete livestock tracking from birth to production
